name: Zhao Zhao
content: Zhao Zhao | School of Computer Science Zhao Zhao Assistant ProfessorEmail: zzhao24@uoguelph.caOffice: Reynolds 2201 Research Statement My research aims to harness emerging technologies to foster healthier lifestyles and improve human functionality in a future where we coexist with multiple intelligent entities. Central to this vision, I focus on utilizing wearable-based physiological sensors to gain a nuanced understanding of individuals, enabling the personalization of their daily interactions with the world. By integrating physiological data with intelligent systems, I seek to create adaptive and responsive environments that support well-being and enhance human experience in an increasingly interconnected world.
